data.title: Countdown music video CCTV
data.meta_description: Music has the power to soothe the savage beast. So, today we are going to take some time to countdown the most popular music videos recently released in China, hopefully allowing you to tame the beast within.
data.text:
Music has the power to soothe the savage beast. So, today we are going to take some time to countdown the most popular music videos recently released in China, hopefully allowing you to tame the beast within.

No.5: Alisa Galper: I'm not a bad girl

"I'm Not a Bad Girl" is the leading tune in the collection "Alisa," the latest album by the titular singer. The song is an adaptation of the classic pop tune "Bad Girl." Donning a electronic-age costume and dancing to the strong beat, Alisa Galper infuses new energy into the song. In the music video, she plays multiple roles, ranging from dancer, flight attendant, poor rich girl, and cat woman.

No.4: Sodagreen: Crazy heat

In the midst of chilly autumn winds, Sodagreen is recalling the stifling heat of the past summer with their album "Crazy Heat". The leading song of the same name proved a big hit as expected. The music video was shot in London, and the production is filled with the passion and affection of youth in the heat of summer.

No. 3: Jerry Yan: I will adore you

"I Will Adore You" is a major tune on Jerry Yan's latest album. First appearing in a TV commercial, the song combines a smooth style with R&B. This is the first time that Jerry Yan has interpreted such a sweet tune. In the music video, Yan plays opposite a fashionable young girl in a fulfilling, but tortuous love story.

No. 2: Zhou Xun: Love and hate

"Love and Hate" is actress and singer Zhou Xun's latest single. The theme song of a popular Internet video game, the song secured a faithful audience long before its release. The music was composed by Xiao Ke and the lyrics came from Lin Xi. In the music video, Zhou Xun plays a fox fairy dressed in a crimson gown. The music video has enjoyed wide popular acclaim.

No.1: Angela Chang: White on white

"White on White" is the leading tune of Angela Chang's latest album. It was created by the composer Chen Wei and lyricist Li Zhuoxiong. The style is a lyrical rock'n'roll ballad, the type by which Angela Chang first gained major fame. In the music video, Chang plays a patron of polar bears. As the character shifts between the reality and illusion, the audience is brought into a wonderland of entertaining surprises.
